SEARCH

Class Administrator

java.lang.Object
User
Staff
Administrator
public class Administrator extends Staff
The Administrator class extends the Staff class and provides functionalities specific to managing hospital staff, appointments, medication inventory, and replenishment requests. It acts as an interface for administrative tasks within the hospital management system.
